mapper.select: SELECT m.member_key ,m.member_name, m.member_email, tm.ROLE, p.title, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.project_key FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN TEAM_MEMBER tm ON tm.MEMBER_KEY = m.MEMBER_KEY LEFT JOIN TEAM t ON t.team_key = tm.TEAM_KEY LEFT JOIN PROJECT p ON p.project_key = t.PROJECT_KEY WHERE m.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{member_name}||'%' AND p.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' ORDER BY m.MEMBER_KEY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task (task_key, MEMBER_KEY, PROJECT_KEY, text, START_DATE, END_DATE, DURATION, PROGRESS, TASK_TYPE, STATUS, detail) VALUES (TASK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{member_key}, #{project_key} , #{text}, to_DATE(#{start_date},'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_DATE (#{start_date},'YYYY-MM-DD'), FLOOR(to_DATE (#{start_date},'YYYY-MM-DD')-to_DATE(#{start_date},'YYYY-MM-DD')), 0, 'task','요청',#{detail})
